person.note: Wu(3) Qian(2) [16041] He petitioned to allow the six junzi (including Chen(1) Yizhong [15991], Huang(2) Yong(3) [15994] and Lin(1) Zezu [15995]) to directly take the palace exams, which they did in 1262. He was Jiangnan Xi yunfu during Duanping (1234-36) and during an undated period of Lizong's reign, he served as Duda tidian kengye. Jiangxi TZ, 11.3a, 5b. CBD, 2, 1121-1122.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1247: Apt. Tong qianshu Shumi yuan shi (State Council).1247: Made concurrently Canzhi zhengshi.1247: Left council of state to be prefect of Fuzhou (Fujian).1249: Apt. Tongzhi Shumi yuan shi concurrently Canzhi zhengshi.1251: Apt. You chengxiang.1252: Dismissed from state council to a temple sinecure.1259: Apt. Zuo chengxiang concurrently Shumi shi.1260: Dismissed from state council to a temple sinecure.
